Question about gadget chart
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Question about gadget chart
By Summit_trainer on Wednesday, July 26, 2006 - 11:17 am:

I just saw the gadget chart, showing which breeds use what, VERY nice. I just wondered how you figured what stats it trains in, doesn't this depend on the gadget parts you use??

By darklao on Wednesday, July 26, 2006 - 10:19 pm:

The stats listed are just the stats reflected in the game's flavor text for the gadget/parts. So, for Knife Throw, it's listed as Acc because that's what the game lists it as, and so the primary benefit a monster gets from it is usually going to be Acc.

Of course, the actual stats gained are dependant on the gadget kit and the tank you use. At some point, I have plans to do a more in-depth gadget analysis, figuring how much (in arrows) each gadget kit/tank will put on a gadget, and at what levels, but for right now, the most important thing is to be able to answer something like, "I need to train my Pancho in Def/Int! What gadgets should I look at?"

But yeah, the chart is great. It was lovingly compiled by howlzapper.
